context.title: Publications List (2014)
context.content:
BOOKS AND EDITED VOLUMES

Min Hou and Zou Yu (eds). Annual dictionary of Chinese New Words (2013). The Commercial Press, Beijing, Nov. 2014.

Guo Xi, Min Hou, Yang Erhong and Zhou Hongbo (eds). Language Situation in China (Annual Report of 2014). The Commercial Press, Beijing, Sep. 2014.
 

JOURNAL ARTICLES AND CONFERENCE PAPERS

Linlin Liang, Min Hou & Yuyin He. Quantitative Study on Words in China Government Work Reports and Social Changes. Guangxi Social Sciences, 2014, (4): pages 141-144.

Ying Zhang, Min Hou and Linlin Liang. Resolving Personal Pronouns in Chinese Topic-oriented Microblogs. In Proceeding of the 6th International Conference on Internet Multimedia Computing and Service, July 2014, Xiamen: pages 359-362.

Ying Zhang, Linlin Liang and Min Hou. On the Features of Personal Pronoun in the Chinese Topic-oriented Microblog and Resolution Strategies. Journal of Hainan University (Humanities & Social Sciences), 2014, (2): 119-128.

Ying Zhang and Xue Zhao. A Computational Stylistic Analysis of News on Official Microblogs and Portal Webs. Theory and Modernization, 2014, (4): 107-111.

Ying Zhang. Strategies for Teaching Chinese as a Second Language Based on Constructive Language Identity. Journal of Shenyang University(Social Science), 2014, (3): 407-409.

Ying Zhang and Mengshi Sun. Comparative Analysis of English and Chinese Advertising Words: From the Perspective of Prominent Category Theory. Journal of Qiongzhou University, 2014, (4): 80-83.

ZHANG Jing;ZHU Bo;LIANG Linlin;HOU Min;TENG Yonglin. Recognition and Classification of Emotions in the Chinese Microblog Based on Emotional Factor. Acta Scientiarum Naturalium Universitatis Pekinensis. 2014, (01): 79-84.

ZHOU Hongzhao, HOU Mingwu, YAN Pengli, ZHANG Yeqing, HOU Min, TENG Yonglin. Function of Semantic Features in Opinion Target Extraction and Its Polarity Identification. Acta Scientiarum Naturalium Universitatis Pekinensis, Vol. 50, No. 1 (Jan. 2014): 93-99.

Zhou Hongzhao,Hou Mingwu,Hou Min,Teng Yonglin.Chinese Comparative Sentences Identification and Comparative Elements Extraction Based on Semantic Classification.Journal of Chinese Information Processing, 2014, (3): pages 136-141.

ZHU Bo,HOU Min,Method for new sentiment word extraction based on boundary feature.Journal of Chongqing University of Posts and Telecommunications(Natural Science Edition), 2014, (6): 796-802.
